welcome_message_body: Welcome to Eghezee, Belgium! This charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes, rich history, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Eghezee has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited bandwidth and speed.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Liege Airport, primarily used for cargo and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
